nodes.text: Nici was a Human male who served as an engineer at the Theed Hangar on planet Naboo around 32 BBY. That year, the Trade Federation invaded Naboo. Nici was held captive in a corner of the hangar by a squad of battle droids, along with several guards, pilots and fellow engineers. They were freed by the Jedi Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi, who sought to escape occupied Naboo with Queen Amidala.
A male Human with rosy skin, Nici had dark eyes and a dimple in his chin. Like all engineers attached to the Royal Security Forces, he wore the issued yellow jumpsuit and helmet.

This article assumes that inscribed helmets of the Royal Naboo Security Forces correspond to their wearers' names, following the example of Simon Jabesq, whose helmet reads "Simon" in Futhork, when using the symbol-to-letter correspondence from The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia.
